gdpr_erasure_confirm_banner_title: Warning: Confirming will log you out, and you’ll lose access to the deleted account.
gdpr_erasure_confirm_banner_description: Closing the account will permanently delete it. Otherwise, we’ll open a support ticket, and an advisor will contact you as soon as possible.
gdpr_erasure_confirm_input_code_prompt: Please enter the code sent to your email.
gdpr_erasure_confirm_form_message_invali: Please enter a valid format. Check that the field does not have any open (<) or close (>) angle brackets.
